info.title: Accounting Backend
info.description: Accounting backend API with JWT authentication

post.description:
Standard login endpoint with username/email and password.
Returns fresh access token and refresh token.

Refresh endpoint - exchange a valid refresh token for a new access token.
The new access token will be marked as non-fresh.

Fresh login endpoint for re-authentication.
Used when a fresh token is required for sensitive operations.
Only returns a new access token (doesn't generate new refresh token).

delete.description:
Logout endpoint - revokes the current access token.
For complete logout, client should also call /logout-refresh.

Revoke refresh token endpoint.
Call this along with /logout for complete logout.

get.description:
Get current authenticated user.
Requires valid access token (fresh or non-fresh).
Initiate Fortnox OAuth flow by redirecting to authorization URL.
Test endpoint to fetch customers from Fortnox API.
Endpoint to stream LLM responses for a given query.
Get all companies associated with the current user, including their role
